text: São Paulo/Guarulhos International Airport is an airport that serves São Paulo, Brazil, located 25 km north of the city centre. It is sometimes called Cumbica Airport, after the suburb in which it is located. Its IATA code is GRU and ICAO code is SBGR. The following airlines fly into Guarulhos: *Aerolineas Argentinas *Aeroméxico *Air Canada *Air France *Alitalia *American Airlines *All Nippon Airways *Avianca *British Airways *BRA *Copa Airlines *Cubana de Aviación *Delta Airlines *Iberia Airlines *JAL Japan Airlines *KLM Royal Dutch *LAN Airlines *Lapa *Lloyd Aero Boliviano *Lufthansa *Nacional Transporte Aéreo *Ocean Air *Rio Sul *South African Airways *Scandinavian Airlines *Swiss Air *LATAM Cargo Brasil *TAP Portugal *United Airlines *Varig *Via Brasil Many of these airlines have lounges at Guarulhos, most of which have internet access and mobile phone support, along with two meeting rooms for corporate executives. There are also several restaurants, bookstores and cafés in the airport. == Other websites == * Official website Category:Airports in Brazil Category:Buildings and structures in São Paulo Category:Guarulhos
title: São Paulo/Guarulhos International Airport
